H0.text: Excursion is the side‑to‑side movement of the mandible.

H1.text: Twitching is the side-to-side movement of the mandible.

H2.text: Cycling is the side‑to‑side movement of the mandible.

H3.text: Shifting is the side-to-side movement of the mandible.

A4.text: The jawbone can articulate side to side as well as forward and back.
